triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper is a comprehensive review of UAVs, their applications, challenges, and security issues.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly discusses UAV swarms as an important topic in the survey.

triples.name: Wireless
triples.relevance: The paper discusses wireless communication as one of the UAV applications.

triples.name: Aerial surveillance
triples.relevance: The paper identifies aerial surveillance as a key UAV application domain.

triples.name: Precision agriculture
triples.relevance: The paper mentions precision farming as one of the main UAV applications.

triples.name: Search and rescue
triples.relevance: The paper lists search and rescue as a critical application for UAVs.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: The paper discusses flight autonomy as a key functionality challenge for UAVs.

triples.name: Electric battery
triples.relevance: The paper identifies battery endurance as a critical technical limitation affecting UAV flight time.
